languages.text: "Ни в коем случае! Я не дам каким-то нелюдям загубить все, что мы так старательно готовили... Предлагаю оставить это место и вернуться в уголок пиршества и умиротворения! Если позволите, я буду ожидать вас у главного стола, Ваше Сия... Сия... О, Император, дай мне сил!" {n}Шумно сглотнув, губернатор спешно покидает место кровавой бойни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ни в коем случае. Я не дам каким-то нелюдям загубить все, что мы так старательно готовили к вашему прибытию. Но сейчас, Ваше Сиятельство, предлагаю оставить это дурно пахнущее и еще хуже выглядящее место — и вернуться в уголок пиршества и умиротворения. Иначе — уж простите великодушно за такие подробности — мой желудок вот-вот исторгнет все содержимое прямо у вас на глазах, а такого позора я точно не переживу!"

languages.text: "Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ни в коем случае! Я не дам каким-то нелюдям загубить все, что мы так старательно готовили... Предлагаю оставить это место и вернуться в уголок пиршества и умиротворения! Если позволите, я буду ожидать вас у главного стола, Ваше Сия... Сия... О, Император, дай мне сил!" {n}Шумно сглотнув, губернатор спешно покидает место кровавой бойни.{/n}

"Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

"Absolutely not! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare for your arrival. I suggest we leave this foul-smelling and even worse-looking place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. The sooner, the better, because — forgive me for not sparing you the details — my stomach is about to expel its contents before your gaze, and I cannot bear the embarrassment!"

"Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

"Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

languages.text: “噢，这才哪到哪！我决不允许那群畜生毁掉我们辛辛苦苦准备的一切……我建议，我们离开这个地方，回到欢宴与安宁的角落。请允许我告退，我会在主桌旁边等候您，大……大……噢，神皇在上，请赐予我力量吧！”{n}总督吞吞吐吐，离开了屠杀现场。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “噢，这才哪到哪！我决不允许那群畜生毁掉我们辛辛苦苦准备的一切……我建议，我们离开这个地方，回到欢宴与安宁的角落。请允许我告退，我会在主桌旁边等候您，大……大……噢，神皇在上，请赐予我力量吧！”{n}总督吞吞吐吐，离开了屠杀现场。{/n}

languages.text: «¡En absoluto! No permitiré que unos animales echen por tierra lo que tanto nos ha costado organizar... Sugiero que nos distanciemos de lo ocurrido y volvamos a nuestro remanso de paz y festividad. Con su venia, le estaré esperando en la mesa principal, Ilust... Emin... ¡ay, Dios Emperador, dame fuerzas!». {n}El gobernador traga saliva y abandona a toda prisa el escenario de la masacre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡En absoluto! No permitiré que unos animales echen por tierra lo que tanto nos ha costado organizar... Sugiero que nos distanciemos de lo ocurrido y volvamos a nuestro remanso de paz y festividad. Con su venia, le estaré esperando en la mesa principal, Ilust... Emin... ¡ay, Dios Emperador, dame fuerzas!». {n}El gobernador traga saliva y abandona a toda prisa el escenario de la masacre.{/n}

languages.text: "Hiç de bile! Hayvanların hazırlamak için bu kadar çok çalıştığımız her şeyi mahvetmesine izin vermeyeceğim... Bu yerden uzaklaşmamızı, şenlik ve barış köşemize dönmemizi öneririm. İzninizle baş masada sizi bekliyor olacağım L... Lord... Tanrı İmparator, sen ban güç ver!" {n}Gürültüyle yutkunan vali, katliam mahallinden aceleyle ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hiç de bile! Hayvanların hazırlamak için bu kadar çok çalıştığımız her şeyi mahvetmesine izin vermeyeceğim... Bu yerden uzaklaşmamızı, şenlik ve barış köşemize dönmemizi öneririm. İzninizle baş masada sizi bekliyor olacağım L... Lord... Tanrı İmparator, sen ban güç ver!" {n}Gürültüyle yutkunan vali, katliam mahallinden aceleyle ayrılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: 「構いません！私は、私たちが一生懸命準備したものすべてをいくつかの獣に破壊させるつもりはありません…この場所から離れて、ささやかなお祭り騒ぎと平穏に戻りたいです。あなたのお許しを頂けるのならば、主賓席をご用意して待っております。あなた…あぁ、神帝陛下、お力を！」{n}騒々しく飲み下すと、総督は急いで虐殺の現場から出発する。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「構いません！私は、私たちが一生懸命準備したものすべてをいくつかの獣に破壊させるつもりはありません…この場所から離れて、ささやかなお祭り騒ぎと平穏に戻りたいです。あなたのお許しを頂けるのならば、主賓席をご用意して待っております。あなた…あぁ、神帝陛下、お力を！」{n}騒々しく飲み下すと、総督は急いで虐殺の現場から出発する。{/n}

languages.text: « Certainement pas ! Je ne laisserai pas une poignée de monstres ruiner tout ce que nous avons préparé à la sueur de notre front... Je suggère que nous quittions cet endroit pour regagner le petit coin tranquille dévolu aux festivités. Avec votre permission, je vous attendrai à la table d'honneur, Votre S... Votre... Ô Empereur-Dieu, donnez-moi la force ! » {n}Déglutissant avec difficulté, le gouverneur se hâte de quitter les lieux du carnage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... I suggest we distance ourselves from this place and return to our corner of revelry and peace. By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Certainement pas ! Je ne laisserai pas une poignée de monstres ruiner tout ce que nous avons préparé à la sueur de notre front... Je suggère que nous quittions cet endroit pour regagner le petit coin tranquille dévolu aux festivités. Avec votre permission, je vous attendrai à la table d'honneur, Votre S... Votre... Ô Empereur-Dieu, donnez-moi la force ! » {n}Déglutissant avec difficulté, le gouverneur se hâte de quitter les lieux du carnage.{/n}

languages.text: "Von wegen! Ich lasse mir doch nicht von ein paar Bestien alles verderben, was wir so mühsam vorbereitet haben ... Ich schlage vor, wir entfernen uns von hier und kehren wieder in unsere Ecke der Prasserei und des Friedens zurück. Wenn Ihr erlaubt, warte ich am Tisch auf Euch, Eure L... Eure ... Oh, Gottimperator, gib mir Kraft!" {n}Der Gouverneur schluckt vernehmlich und verlässt eilig den Ort des Gemetzels.{/n}.
languages.original_text: "Not in the least! I will not let some beasts ruin everything we have worked so hard to prepare... By your leave, I will be waiting for you at the head table, Your L— Your— Oh, God-Emperor, give me strength!" {n}Swallowing noisily, the governor hurriedly departs the scene of slaughter.{/n}
